subject: Dreamweaver CS3 ready to download
body:
Diplomacy is to do and say the nastiest things in the nicest way.

How come ''fat chance'' and ''slim chance'' mean the same thing?

If there exists no possibility of failure, then victory is meaningless.

The best place to seek God is in a garden. You can dig for him there.

I am a winner each and every time I go into the ring.

Ambition has one heel nailed in well, though she stretch her fingers to touch the heavens.

Once I make up my mind, I'm full of indecision.

Seriousness is the only refuge of the shallow.

I think the biggest disease this world suffers from…is people feeling unloved.

Our faults irritate us most when we see them in others.

In a false quarrel there is no true valor.

A classic is a book that has never finished saying what it has to say.

The only thing that's been a worse flop than the organization of non-violence has been the organization of violence.
